title: Beyond Jailbreak: Unveiling Risks in LLM Applications Arising from Blurred Capability Boundaries
summary: LLM applications (i.e., LLM apps) leverage the powerful capabilities of LLMs to provide users with customized services, revolutionizing traditional application development. While the increasing prevalence of LLM-powered applications provides users with unprecedented convenience, it also brings forth new security challenges.
